DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether FG-4592 ( roxadustat ) safe effective treatment anemia patient begin dialysis treatment end stage renal disease .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Treatment Anemia ESRD Newly Initiated Dialysis Patients
DOC.detailed_description: There screen period 6 week , treatment period minimum 52 week maximum approximately 3 year last patient randomize , post-treatment follow-up period 4 week . A total 750 patient randomize 1:1 ratio receive either open-label FG-4592 Active Control ( Epoetin alfa ) .

Study participant permanent dialysis access place . 4 . No iron deficiency . 5 . No folate Vitamin B12 deficiency . 6 . No abnormal liver test . 7 . Body weight 160 kg ( HD : dry weight ) . Red blood cell transfusion within 8 week prior participate study . 4 . Active infection . 5 . Heart attack , stroke , bloodclots within major vessel within 12 week prior participate study . 8 . Uncontrolled high blood pressure within 2 week prior participate study . 9 . Renal ultrasound perform within 12 week prior participate study suspicious renal cancer . 10 . Active cancer . 11 . Positive human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis B hepatitis C. 12 .
